creator: cberneburg@caci.com
text:
Created attachment 34313
documentation patch for JreMemoryLeakPreventionListener classesToInitialize example

Purpose: Add a small example server.xml snippet to the JreMemoryLeakPreventionListener documentation to make it clear to newbies how to implement the classesToInitialize option.

Method: Added new examples area in JreMemoryLeakPreventionListener subsection after attributes table in listeners.xml.  Added specific example for classesToInitialize option.

Thanks for the patch.

I tweaked it slightly including:
- tabs -> spaces
- remove trailing white space
- used a sub-section instead of a header so the header size/indent was consistent

This has been fixed in the following branches:
- 9.0.x for 9.0.0.M11 onwards
- 8.5.x for 8.5.6 onwards
- 8.0.x for 8.0.38 onwards
- 7.0.x for 7.0.73 onwards
- 6.0.x for 6.0.46 onwards
creator: markt@apache.org

text: Mark, thanks for cleaning up the patch.  Also, it's good to know that subsections can be nested.
creator: cberneburg@caci.com
